update project
lab_id = #{labId,jdbcType=CHAR},
tea_id = #{teaId,jdbcType=CHAR},

files = #{files,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
